name: Hosted Receptionist
overview:
Have trouble handling your call volume? Need someone to cover the phones after hours? Our virtual receptionists act as a member of your staff and provide excellent customer service to your callers every time. We get to know your business and design a script that works with your unique needs. Our receptionists can: Screen calls and transfer or take a message as needed; Take orders; Schedule appointments

Never miss an opportunity because you are unavailable or the caller gets a busy signal. Our receptionists are available 24/7/365 and 90% of calls are answered within 20 seconds.
